meta.title: Student Testimonials - Wendogo Transformed Their Journey
meta.description: Discover authentic testimonials from students supported by Wendogo. Over 2,100 students have achieved their dream of studying in France thanks to our personalized support.
meta.keywords: Wendogo student testimonials, Campus France reviews, study France success, international student support
meta.ogTitle: Student Testimonials - Wendogo Transformed Their Journey

meta.twitterDescription: Discover how Wendogo transformed the journey of over 2,100 students

hero.title: They Achieved Their Dream of Studying in France
hero.description: Discover the authentic testimonials of over 2,100 students who transformed their journey thanks to Wendogo's personalized support.

1.name: Achraf M.
1.testimonial: I got my baccalaureate in physical sciences with French option (BIOF) in 2019. At first, I knew nothing about Campus France and visa procedures. The Wendogo team supported me from A to Z. Edgar helped me choose between OrlÃ©ans and Angers - OrlÃ©ans turned out to be perfect for my studies in pure sciences. The most reassuring part? I only paid once I got my visa!
1.advice: Trust Wendogo, they know the procedures perfectly. Don't hesitate to ask all your questions, even the most basic ones.

2.name: Marie K.
2.testimonial: Health programs are very regulated in France, I couldn't find any private schools. Edgar explained that everything goes through Campus France and guided me toward Paris-Saclay in parallel. His advice for the Campus France interview was invaluable. Result: accepted at Lyon 1! I'm grateful for this support.
2.advice: For health programs, stick to official pathways. The Campus France interview is crucial - prepare well!

3.name: Ahmed B.
3.testimonial: After my engineering degree in Algeria, I wanted to switch to management. The Wendogo team helped me target the right business schools and prepare a strong application. Their knowledge of Algerian specifics saved me months. Now at ESSEC, I highly recommend them!
3.advice: Don't hesitate to change paths - Wendogo will help you showcase your previous experience.

4.name: Fatima S.
4.testimonial: As a woman in tech in Senegal, I wanted to specialize in France. Wendogo not only helped me with Campus France but also finding student housing in Paris. Their support goes beyond administrative procedures - they think of everything!
4.advice: Wendogo thinks about all aspects of your project - not just official procedures.

5.name: Mariama S.
5.program: Master in Audit and Management Control
5.testimonial: I obtained my bachelor's degree in accounting, control and audit in 2017, then worked as an accounting assistant. In 2024, I decided to resume my studies in France. Thanks to Wendogo, I was perfectly supported in preparing for the ESG Finance entrance exam. I was finally admitted! Their support also helped me better understand the banking issues related to my visa application. Thank you so much!
journey: ESG Finance exam preparation with Wendogo
5.advice: Even if you left school a long time ago, it's never too late. Wendogo supports you with dedication and kindness at every step.

6.name: Amina L.
6.testimonial: Sciences Po was my dream! But the admission procedures are complex. Wendogo guided me through the specific IEP process, helped me prepare for the entrance exam and interviews. Their expertise in French grandes Ã©coles makes all the difference.
6.advice: For grandes Ã©coles, specialized expertise is essential. Wendogo knows all the codes.
